Content.Text:
<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Good morning. You're looking cheerful
today.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Good morning. It looks like your work is
busiest in the morning. Give it your
best today.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Good morning. It feels good to greet
people. Don't you agree?

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, it's you. I was just pondering
something. Sorry for not responding to
your salutation.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Good day. When I see you work, I feel
like some of your energy spills over
into me.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
It's easy to get sleepy at this hour.
Don't you agree?

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Good evening. Are you still working at
this hour? Being passionate about your
work is good but don't overdo it.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Good evening. Nights in this town are
quiet, aren't they? Well, I suppose
quiet is better than noisy.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
What are you doing out at this hour?
Have you finished your work?

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Good morning, <MYNAME>. You're looking
good again today.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Good morning, <MYNAME>. I'm happy I get
to see you so early in the day.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Good morning, <MYNAME>. I was just
thinking that it would be nice to see
you.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Good morning, <MYNAME>. How is work on the
farm going? Let me know if there's
anything I can do to help.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, hello <MYNAME>. I don't feel like my
day has really started until you say
hello to me.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Good day, <MYNAME>. We use different
greetings in my country.
<PAGE>
I'd like to teach them to you sometime.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Good evening, <MYNAME>. Is it alright for
you to be up this late? You've got to
get up early again tomorrow, don't you?

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Good evening, <MYNAME>. Did you come to
say hello? That's very proper of you.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Good evening. I'm starting to enjoy
nights in this town more than I used to.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
Good morning, <MYNAME>. Why do mornings
on the farm start so early? It couldn't
hurt to start a little later, could it?

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Good morning, <MYNAME>. Let's give it our
best again today. I'll do what I can to
help.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Good morning, <MYNAME>. Regardless of the
weather, mornings on the farm are always
refreshing. What a pleasant surprise.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hmm? What's that? Oh, sorry. I've been
busy, so I forgot to say hello.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Oh, <MYNAME>. Don't just stand there. Come
on over here.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You're very talented, <MYNAME>. I guess
you have to be to manage a farm. I've
got a lot to learn from you.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
I didn't think you were going to talk to
me today. Did I do something to make you
mad?

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
You must be tired after all that hard
work today. You should take it easy
now.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Well, it's about time to go to sleep.
What? You want to stay up later? Come
on, don't behave like a child.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Ah, the weather's so nice today. This
is good weather for exercising. Would
you like to join me?

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hey, <MYNAME>. The rain around this time
of year really chills to the bone,
doesn't it? Take care of yourself, okay?

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Yeah, it is quite hot today. But I 
actually kind of like this weather.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, hello <MYNAME>. The rain around this
time of year is pleasant. Don't you
agree?

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Hey, <MYNAME>. I love this fall air. The
temperature is perfect, and I feel
healthy and strong.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hey, <MYNAME>. Don't you love the fall
rain? There's an almost elegant air to
it.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, hi <MYNAME>. There's something about
the air around this time of year that
makes my body feel tense.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Snow really amazes me since we don't get
any in my country.
<PAGE>
<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>I want to bring it back home and show it
to my little sister.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
Ah, <MYNAME>. I hate it when the wind is
this strong. There's nothing to do but
sit at home and wait for it to stop.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
Ah, <MYNAME>. I hate it when it snows this
much. There's nothing to do but sit at
home and wait for it to stop.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
Hey, it's too dangerous to go outside
today. You'd get blown away by the wind.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
I can't believe that it's snowing so
much. Do you think the town will be
okay?

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hello, <MYNAME>. I heard that you're in a
relationship now.
<PAGE>
<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>Hehe. I can tell how happy you are just
by looking at you. Congratulations! I
hope things go well.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Ahh, the nature here is fantastic. And
the animals are all full of life too.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
I'm going to draw a sketch of this
scenery and send it to my little sister.
I'm sure it would make her happy.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
The river here is very beautiful. There
are all sorts of fish swimming around
that I never saw in my home country.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I used to live in a beautiful place that
was much like this town. The nature
there was about as bountiful as here.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
It feels good to be at the summit. I
enjoy climbing mountains because I'm
always excited to get to the top.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Have you ever peered into the lake? It
seems like there's something there,
but I'm not really sure.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>, your farm seems like a magical
place where anything can happen. I can
tell you've put a lot of work into it.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
No matter how many times I see it, I'm
still impressed by how big this place
is. It must feel great to lie down here.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
To think that such beautiful jewels lie
hidden underground. Nature is very
mysterious.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
It must be difficult to work in a harsh
place like this. Miners are certainly
brave.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
This town is really lively. I like the
friendly atmosphere a lot.
<PAGE>
More and more people are sure to flock
to a nice town like this. That's
something to look forward to.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
I'm sure it would be difficult to find a
town as wonderful as this one.
<PAGE>
The reason I feel that way is because
this town is so lively and friendly. I
simply love it.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
This town has a lot of positive people.
I have a feeling it's going to become a
great town.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Ever since I was little, I've received
lots of different types of training, so
I know how to do a wide range of things.
<PAGE>
<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>But I'm bad at handling things that have
to do with daily life, like housework.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I know the growth of this town depends
on you, <MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
I may not be able to help much, but I
want you to know that I'm rooting for
you.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Sanjay is an excellent butler. He
maintains a proper relationship with me,
and I can always turn to him for advice.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
I've always had difficulty getting along
with other people. When I'm listening to
someone, I find myself doubting them.
<PAGE>
<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>I know it's a terrible tendency, but I
had to deal with a lot of people in my
country who had ulterior motives.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
I have a little sister. We used to play
together in the garden a lot. I hope
she's doing well.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
I didn't expect that we'd become this
close. I appreciate having you as a
friend.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
... Do you know why I'm mad? No, of
course you don't...

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
What are we to each other? I'm not
really sure anymore.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
To think that we'd be going out
together. Life is really unpredictable.
Don't you agree, <MYNAME>?

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
When I told Sanjay that we started going
out, he was so happy for me that I felt
kind of embarrassed.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>, now that I'm going out with you,
my whole life feels more positive.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
You're a hard worker, <MYNAME>. If you
weren't, there's no way you'd be able
to revive this town.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
Is it really all right for me to be this
happy? I couldn't let the people of my
country see me like this.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
Are you happy that you married me?
Because you don't look happy, <MYNAME>!

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
What is it about me that you're so
unhappy with, <MYNAME>? I won't know
unless you tell me.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Marriage has given me the valuable
opportunity to experience what normal
people's lives are like .

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Farm work used to look easy, but now I
know how hard it is. I respect you a
lot, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
My outlook on life has changed
tremendously since we got married. It's
all thanks to you, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
<MYNAME>, meeting you has made me the
luckiest man in the world... I can't
believe I just said that.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
Hmm. I know we're going out, but what
exactly does that mean we should do?
<PAGE>
<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>What? Just be natural? I know, but I'm
still not used to this kind of
situation.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Don't be so worried, <MYNAME>. Even though
we broke up, we're still friends, right?

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
<MYNAME>, I'm much more serious about
preserving our relationship now than I
was when we were going out before.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
I-I'm sorry... Even though our wedding
is so close, now I'm getting nervous all
of a sudden.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
You know, every day is fun now.
Everything feels fresh, and I'm
discovering new things all the time.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
To think that I'm going to become a
father. I can hardly believe it.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Your stomach's a lot bigger now. Take it
easy with the farm work, okay? It'd be
terrible if something happened to you.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
The baby is supposed to be born soon,
right? Don't worry, I'll be by your side
when the time comes.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Newborn babies are so small. This
reminds of when my little sister was
born.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Babies are tough to take care of once
they start crawling because they're
always moving around.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<CHILD_NAME> sure has gotten big. Well,
I guess that just means that the two
of us are getting old.
<PAGE>
<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>I'm looking forward to finding out what
kind of adult our child will grow up to
be.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
<CHILD_NAME> as an adult...
<PAGE>
When this kid is fully grown, I wonder
what kind of couple we'll be.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
This stew is for me? I really appreciate
this.
<PAGE>
Ah, the flavor is perfect. Stew is my
favorite food, you know. Thank you.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
A present? For me? I appreciate this.
It's one of my favorites. Thank you.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
This is for me? This is a really good
present. It's one of my favorite things.
<PAGE>
Thank you, <MYNAME>. I'll gladly take it.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, is this for me? Thank you.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
What do you expect me to do with this?
I don't want you to give me something
like this again.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Are you holding some kind of a grudge
against me? I don't want something like
this ever again.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
I've always hated this soup. Why, you
ask? I don't even want to talk about it.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
This is... big. How did you grow this?
I'm going to send it back to my country
for research.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
This is really heavy. I'm sure I can use
it to make a lot different types of
food. Thank you.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Is this for me? It's really big. Thank
you.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Whoa! Th-This is big! How did you raise
this to grow so big? I'll gratefully
accept it.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Is this for me? It's so big that I don't
even know what to do with it. I'll do
my best to eat it.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Is this for me? It's very big. Thank
you.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
No thanks. I don't take gifts from
people who I'm not close to.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
It's about time you realized that you
can't buy my favor with gifts.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
What's this? Trying to make everything
better with a present is pretty
childish.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I can't take that now. You already gave
me a present today.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
I don't need this many presents. We're
a couple now, so just take it easy.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You already gave me something today. I'm
fine, so why don't you just put that in
your bag for now.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
... A birthday present? Now that you
mention it, it is my birthday.
<PAGE>
<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>This is stew, right? Wow, it's
incredibly delicious. Thank you, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
A birthday present? For me? I really
appreciate this.
<PAGE>
I'll never forget this present that you
gave me today. Thank you, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
A birthday present? I can't believe you
know when my birthday is. What did you
get me?
<PAGE>
Nice. I like this. You must have done
your homework to figure this one out.
Thank you.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
A birthday present? I'll gratefully
accept it.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
A birthday present? What did you get me?
<PAGE>
<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>Oh, this... Well, I guess I better
take it.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hmm? What's this? A birthday present?
<PAGE>
<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>Th-Thank you... But next time, don't
worry about getting me anything...

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
This is what you get me on my birthday?!
Sturgeon soup is the last thing that I
wanted to see on this day.
<PAGE>
When I was little, I was fed sturgeon
soup almost every day. I eventually got
tired of it, and now I really hate it.
<PAGE>
<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>No, I'm sorry. I know you didn't do this
on purpose. I'll accept the gift.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
A birthday present? It's very big. It
certainly looks auspicious. Thank you.
I appreciate this.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Is this big thing my birthday present?
It's amazing! Thank you.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Wow, this is big. It's a birthday
present, you say? Thank you.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Wh-What is this? It's many times bigger
than normal. Th-This is my birthday
present?
<PAGE>
I had no idea that I'd be getting
something like this. I really
appreciate it.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Haha, you're like a little kid, trying
to surprise me with something big on my
birthday like this.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
W-Wow, this is a huge birthday present.
How did you bring it here? Oh, I
forgot to say thank you. Thank you.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Aww, chicks are so cute. I love the way
they go "cheep cheep" and snuggle up to
you.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
I'm always grateful for these chickens
because the eggs that they lay keep us
all healthy.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Th-This chicken is big. A chicken this
big is sure to lay lots of eggs.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Hehe, this dog looks really smart. I
used to have a dog, but it was a bit
bigger than this one.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
This is dog is... very fat. I guess fat
dogs are cute in their own way.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
There there, good dog. When I look at
this dog, it reminds me of the dog that
I used to have.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Come on now. This is just too big. You
need to get this dog some exercise. I
can help if you want.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
This is a very sweet cat. Well behaved
cats like this one are easier to take
care of.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
This cat isn't moving at all... is-is it
okay?
<PAGE>
Oh, it moved. Thank goodness. No matter
how cute looking, this cat really needs
some exercise.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
This cat has very nice fur. The little
guy has a quite the noble air.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
I don't care how nice the fur is, this
cat is fat. Some exercise is definitely
in order. Do you want me to help?

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
For the Flower Festival? Oh yeah, 
that's right, they do that in this town
too, don't they. Thank you.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
A present for the Flower Festival? I
see, thank you.
<PAGE>
<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>I don't normally have much to do with
flowers but it' nice to get one like
this.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, is today the Flower Festival? Thank
you. I appreciate this.
<PAGE>
<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>Getting a flower again like this is a
little embarrassing.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Oh, is this for Winter Harmony Day?
Thank you... I'll take it.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Oh, is it Winter Harmony Day? Getting
something like this from my girlfriend
feels wonderful.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Hehe, to think that I'm still getting
Harmony Day presents after marriage. I'm
a lucky guy.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
What are these sweets for? The Pumpkin
Festival? Isn't that a festival for
kids?
<PAGE>
<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>Can I send this to my sister over in my
home country? Okay then, thank you. I'm
sure she'll like it.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
A Pumpkin Festival present? F-For me?
<PAGE>
<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>Haha, that's a funny joke. Anyway, I'll
take it.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Come on, I'm not a child... But it would
be rude to refuse a gift, so I'll
graciously accept.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Is that a blue feather? I heard that
here people give them to someone when
they want to propose to them.
<PAGE>
It's beautiful. I'd like to give one to
someone too one day.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
... Wait a minute. You're rushing into
things a bit. There's still so much that
I don't know about you.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
... A blue feather? W-Wait a second.
<PAGE>
<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>A-Are you sure you want to give this
to me? R-Really? Okay then, come with
me.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
You don't have to keep showing me that.
I've made up my mind and nothing will
change it.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
We don't have any use for that anymore,
do we? Keep it someplace safe.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
... What's going on? I've heard rumors
around town that you've been showing
the blue feather to other people.
<PAGE>
Please stop. It's disgraceful. Are you
unhappy or something?

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, a ring. It doesn't look
particularly unusual.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
What's going on? What's this for?
<PAGE>
<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>You're not doing... what I think you're
doing, are you? Umm...
<PAGE>
Can you give me a little time to think
about this?

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
We have this ring to thank for our
relationship.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
It's good that you like that ring, but I
don't want you to lose it, so try not to
walk around with it too much.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
... What's going on? I've heard rumors
around town that you've been showing the
ring to other people.
<PAGE>
Have you forgotten how important that
ring is, <MYNAME>?

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
I can't believe it doesn't run away.
Have you tamed it? That's rather
impressive.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
I like how wild animals live freely.
They're one of the things that I like
about this town.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
That's a big turtle. It looks like I
could ride on its back. Thanks for
showing it to me.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Today is a special day for you, right?
Here, this is a birthday present for
you. Please take it.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Happy birthday, <MYNAME>. I'm glad to be
able to celebrate your special day.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Congratulations, <MYNAME>! What do you
mean, "what for?" It's your birthday,
right?
<PAGE>
